ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank our colleagues at 60P Pharmaceuticals; Eisai Co., Ltd.; Johnson & Johnson; Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine; Merck KGaA; MSD; Pfizer; University of Buea; University of California, San Diego; and Walter and Eliza Hall Institute of Medical Research for their review and helpful suggestions. We also thank our BVGH colleagues Joseph Hargan-Calvopi√±a and Callie Weber for helpful input.
